description:
Usopp finds an amazing pair of sharpshooter`s goggles, but they lead to a run in with Daddy the Parent - the greatest gunslinger ever! Now, the Straw Hat marksman is headed for the deadliest of all duels.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Usopp Tai Kozure no Daddy: Mahiru no Kettou
Usopp vs Daddy Masterson ! Duel sous le soleil !
Usopp vs. Daddy the Parent! Showdown at High!
Усопп против Папаши Дэдди. Полуденная дуэль
อุซปปะทะแดดดี้! ตัดสินที่ไฮน์นูน!
ウソップVS子連れのダディ 真昼の決闘
